document.full_text: mr. wiedorfer, of baltimore, took out two german machine-gun nests during the battle of the bulge in world war ii.
document.title: paul j. wiedorfer, hero of the battle of the bulge, dies at 90
lines_and_colors: mr. wiedorfer, of baltimore, took out two german machine-gun nests during the battle of the bulge in world war ii.
